price: 18. Sekali-kali tidak! Sesungguhnya catatan orang-orang yang berbakti benar-benar tersimpan dalam 'Illiyyīn.*(902)
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
footnotes: *902). Nama kitab yang mencatat segala perbuatan orang-orang yang berbakti.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
